About

Mary Peck Art Advisory provides professional art appraisal services specializing in Modern Art, Contemporary Art, Charitable Donations, Copyright Infringement, IRS-Compliant Valuations. With 27 years experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.

Based in Denver but serves San Francisco clients via remote services.
